productDescription: With the Jesse jumpsuit it’s always sunshine vibes. Featuring a v-neck with adjustable straps, this button-up jumpsuit has a tie-waist and a feminine flounce pant leg. Made in the Netherlands with 100% organic linen and available in turmeric. Plus free Pina Studio tote with every order.

optionalInfo.material: 100% Organic European Linen, certified with STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX.
optionalInfo.fit:
Marie wears size S / M. She is 1.8m tall (5’10”) and normally wears an EU 36.

In summary, our size S / M fits from EU 36-38. Our M / L fits from EU 38-40. If you’re between sizes, take a S / M for a more fitted look, and a M / L for a looser fit
optionalInfo.production: This garment is handmade in the Netherlands in small batches with a responsible factory. It’s made of certified OEKO-TEX organic linen sourced from Germany with flax grown in South West Europe.
